info.title: Flatchr API Documentation
info.description: This is a sample example of API documentation.

get.description: Get all tasks from a member
Get all calendars from a member
Get all duplicates from a company
Search all applicants from a company

post.description: Search all applicants from a company

get.description: Get all tasks from a member
Get all comments from a candidate
Get all files from a candidate
Get all messages from a candidate
Get all calendars from a applicant
Get all ratings from a candidate

post.description: Create answer related to a question
create new candidate using parsed resume

delete.description: Delete a comment from a candidate
Delete a media from a applicant
